# Resources Directory

This directory contains all static assets for the Piquiyo website.

## Directory Structure:

```
public/
├── images/     # Photos, illustrations, brand assets
├── icons/       # SVG icons, logos, favicons
├── assets/      # Other static files (fonts, documents, etc.)
└── favicon.ico  # Website favicon
```

## How to Use:

### Images:
- Place photos and images in `public/images/`
- Reference them in your code: `/images/your-image.jpg`
- All images will automatically be black & white due to global CSS filter

### Icons:
- Place SVG icons and logos in `public/icons/`
- Reference them: `/icons/your-icon.svg`

### Assets:
- Place other static files like fonts, PDFs, etc. in `public/assets/`
- Reference them: `/assets/your-file.pdf`

## File Naming:
- Use lowercase and hyphens: `team-photo.jpg`
- Be descriptive: `logo-vermilion.svg`
- Keep names short but clear

## Image Guidelines:
- All images automatically display in black & white
- Use high-quality images for best results
- Optimize images for web (compress before uploading)
- Recommended formats: JPG for photos, PNG for graphics with transparency
